title: x/mobile/audio: free resources and unload the external libraries on destroy
body:
The audio package should be able to free dlclose to unload the OpenAL library on Android when application is about to be destroyed.

On other platforms, it should free the virtual device and the created source and buffers.

Since there are no "shutdown" hooks we can listen on the desktop environments, we may provide a package level Destroy function to do the cleaning.
